characters: THAT'S WHEN THE REST OF THE ANDROIDS ATTACK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pick axe SLAMS into solid rock, breaking off a chunk. The prisoner lowers his axe and wipes sweat from his brow Muscled arms, a trim body, alien face partially covered b the nose piece from a rebreather tank.  MERRITT is a hip alien with a sarcastic wit and a kick back attitude, sent to 25 years for hijacking cargo ships. A GUARD nudges Merritt with a rifle, prompting him to wor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Can't you see I'm trying to sleep?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt hefts the axe ad gets back to work. THERE ARE THREE TYPES OF PRISONERS working the mine: Aliens like Merritt. Humans like PRATT, a burned out three time looser with a weight lifter's body. But more than half the prisoners are chrome fingernailed Androids, sentenced for killing humans on Earth.  None of the Androids wear re-breathers... they don't need them. RALPH 124C41 is the leader of the Android gang.  A HUGE m looking droid with metal fingernails and grey eyes, guilt of brutally murdering more than fifty humans.  He slams h axe into the rock... Imagining it's the Warden's head. Working beside Ralph 124C41 are his two henchmen: SMITH E a wiry Android with slicked back hair, aluminum teeth, an pincher claw hands. And COBLENTZ HL2000, whose body is criss-crossed with bas like seams where he's been sewn together after knife figh Coblentz HL2000 breaks through a wall, exposing a vein of glimmering Carnubium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fucking motherlode.  Vein of Carnubium!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt wrinkles his nose under the rebreather.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit, Coblentz, what you found is a damned Deros Cave.  If you weren't a fucking Android you could smell 'em.  Let's get out of here before we're lunch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUDDENLY, a slimy DEROS worm breaks through the opening i front of Coblentz and EATS the PRISONER next to him. The other PRISONERS yell and scramble out of the mine. One of the GUARDS fires his rifle, forcing the Deros back

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PRISONERS sit along the side of the mountain, taking break. Merritt looks up when NOWLAN nudges him with his r

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warden wants to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Must be my lucky day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACK NOWLAN is head guard of the prison mining colony.  T but good natured, he's Esau to Merritt's James Dean-like Jacob, here on the twin sunned planet Isaac. Nowlan clips magnetic leg shackles onto Merritt, then nod for his assistant AL BESTER to take over. Bester is a farm boy prison guard.  Not only second in command, but  Nowlan's best friend.  He wears a cowboy ha has a small town attitude.  Bester gestures for Merritt t get to his feet. Nowlan prods Ralph 124C41 with the rifle, and the Android grabs the barrel.  Nowlan pulls the gun back, then JAMBS into Ralph's gut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warden wants to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw you, screw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got the gun: Screw YOU. Now, you going to cooperate, or am I going to have to shoot you again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph snarls and Nowlan clips on the magnetic shackles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan prods Ralph to his feet, escorts the prisoners awa

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The Prison Building scorches under Isaac's twin suns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester prod the two prisoners into chairs acro from Warden Gernsbeck. In his tailored suit and gold Rolex, VERNON GERNSBECK is type of slimy, bigoted, corrupt warden they make prison m about.  Trophies and political photos adorn the office, obscuring the UN flag in the corner. On his desk, near his polished brass name plate, is a pho of his pretty twenty year old daughter, GARBY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) My two favorite prisoners.  Merritt. Ralph 124C41.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want, Verne?  I'm a busy man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan. Bester. Better stick around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester nod, and keep their guns ready. Gernsbeck lifts two manila folders, giving a false smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been looking over your files, gentlemen. Interesting reading. (to Merritt) Mr. Merritt.  Twenty five years hard labor for the armed hijack of twelve cargo shuttles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fourteen.  There was two they couldn't prove.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You seem to have trouble obeying the rules around here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been disciplined by electroshock forty three times. (beat) I have disciplined you more than thirty times myself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) Sadistic fucker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt just smiles. Gernsbeck pulls the other folder and looks up at Ralph 12

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph 124C41. Life without parole for murdering fifty seven people on Earth.  It says here you were reprogrammed twice, but kept on killing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Humans are scrap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it were my decision, I would have you disassembled and melted down, sold as slag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph the toaster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck looks from Ralph to Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As you know, your labor has been leased by Manrocci Industries to mine the Carnubium deposits here on the planet Isaac.  Now that the Carnubium has been depleted, this prison colony will be closed down. (beat) The human and alien prisoners will be reassigned to the mining colony on Mars....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the 'droids?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Androids will be set free... But remain here on Isaac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about a repairs technician?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck gives Ralph an evil smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  If you break down, you're on your own.  Maybe you can repair yourself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph goes berserk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You piece of scrap!  I'm gonna kill you!  You and all the other human scraps!  I'll kill you ALL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester hold him in his chair. Gernsbeck hits a buzzer.  Two other guards enter the offi KLINE, a jokester ex-Marine, and STILSON, an attractive f guard.  Stilson and Nowlan exchange smoldering looks, spa of attraction between them. KLINE SLAMS Ralph with his gun butt until he sparks, then drags him out with Bester and Stilson's help. Merritt scoops the photo of Garby off the Warden's desk a studies the picture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Verne.  This is just an excuse to keep me away from your daughter. You know she wants me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck pulls the photo out of Merritt's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your hands off my daughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. But you better tell her to keep her hands off of me... You KNOW she's looking for some "close encounters".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll light you up like a Christmas Tree.  You'll get enough voltage to fry that evil little sociopathic brain of yours...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She must take after her mother, Verne, because I don't see a lick of family resemblance.  Was your mail man a handsome guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck is about to explode. He turns to Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was just beginning to like it, here. Thinking about opening an ice rink..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan uses his gun to prod Merritt to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.  Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt lifts his hands and co-operates, allowing Nowlan escort him out of the Warden's office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan escorts Merritt out of the Warden's office and acr the Command Center. THE COMMAND CENTER is a circular room with work stations, security section where video monitors show various interi and exterior views of the prison, and a vidmap of the pri with lighted points showing where prisoners are. A guard named CARTER is on security duty, watching the vi monitors in the security section.  He nods as Nowlan pass by, but ignores Merritt. HALFWAY across the command center, they pass GARBY, Warde Gernsbeck's pretty twenty year old daughter. Garby is one of the few people on the planet not dressed prison denim or guard uniforms.  She's dressed in a VERY sexy outfit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan tries to pull Merritt away from Garby, but she cha course so that she can run her hand across Merritt's body sensually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it true what they say about 'Smovs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Depends upon what they say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby whispers something in Merritt's ear, and he laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that's true about ME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They exchange flirtatious smiles, and Nowlan YANKS Merrit away from her, dragging him to the doorway marked AIRLOCK Merritt looks at her over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until we meet again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They exit and Garby crosses to her father's office and po open the door.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE VIDMAP
dialogues.text: We see two red dots exit the building and cross the terra to a section labeled: Carnubium Mines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph 124C41 slams the pick axe into the rock, grumbling himself.  He's about to explode in anger. Pratt cracks through some rocks and a cloud of dust billo into his face.  He takes a step back, covering his eyes.. bumping into Ralph. Ralph spins, using the head of his axe to press Pratt bac against the wall of the cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Human scrap! Don't ever touch me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt sets down his axe, moves between Ralph and Pratt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was an accident, tin man.  No reason to blow a fuse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do what I please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back off or I'll piss on you while you sleep and rust your ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph lowers the axe head from Pratt's neck... and JABS i at Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt grabs the axe head quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can do without the axe, can't we?  Settle this like men... Oh, I forgot. You're not anatomically correct, are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph lets go of the axe and rushes Merritt. The two begin fighting, and it spills out of the cave int the twin sunlights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph and Merritt fight.  A circle of prisoners around th ON ONE SIDE OF THE CIRCLE, Human and Alien prisoners chee on Merritt.  On the opposite side, Android prisoners with chrome fingernails cheer on Ralph 124C41.

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: Ralph 124C41 lands a pair of solid punches to Merritt's c pressing him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready to die, Alien?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  I'm ready to pound you into sheet metal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt blocks Ralph's next punch, lands a SOLID hit to t Android's jaw.  The Human and Alien prisoners CHEER. Coblentz HL2000 yells at the cheering crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one can fight an Android and win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah? Merritt will turn him into SCRAP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both sides CHEER and JEER at each other.  Tension and hat runs thick between steel and flesh. Merritt tries a combination to Ralph's face, hitting with his right.... But Ralph plucks his left hand out of the a before it can make contact and SQUEEZES it. Merritt screams and we can hear the snap crackle and pop bones breaking.  Merritt kicks Ralph in the chest, forcin the Android to let go of his hand. Merritt staggers back, cradling his injured hand. THE LINE OF ANDROIDS pushes Merritt back towards Ralph. Merritt stumbles right into Ralph's arms.  The Android gr Merritt's neck and squeezes, cutting off his air.  Merrit tries pulling the Android's hands off him, but can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No air, no life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt is beginning to turn blue, when he pulls back his head and SLAMS it into Ralph's. Ralph lets go of Merritt, staggering back from the force the head butt. Merritt takes a deep breath from the rebreather tank, and goes into action.  He spins, kicking Ralph in the head. RALPH AND MERRITT exchange kicks and punches. It's a battle of the titans. Merritt is a great fighter, but his blows do little to sl down Ralph 124C41... No one can fight an android and win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steel against flesh.  You CAN'T win, Merritt!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll win.  Brains against silicon.

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: Merritt takes two brutal kicks to the head, reeling backw The line of Androids pushes him back into the ring. Ralph sends a foot flying at Merritt's head, but Merritt catches it and flips him head over heels onto the sandsto

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kissing the ground I walk on, tin man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph rushes Merritt, slicing out with his chrome fingern and tearing into the Alien's shirt.  Merritt jumps back, then lands a pair of kicks to Ralph's head. Merritt moves in to punch the Android, but Ralph swings o and kicks the rebreather off Merritt's face.  Without oxy Merritt falls back, clutching at his throat. RALPH LAUGHS in victory. Merritt grabs the rebreather mask and forces it onto his face, taking deep breaths until he stabilizes. BANG!  BANG!  Two gunshots. Nowlan and Bester break through the circle and pulls Merr and Ralph off of each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Break it up! Break it up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who wants the first one?  Coblentz?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester aims his rifle from Android to Android. They all fall back, arms in front of them. Nowlan grabs Merritt by the collar and drags him out of t circle, tossing him against the rocks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stupid, convict?  Trying to get yourself killed?  That android'll tear you apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's scrap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some day, Alien, you and me is gonna fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be looking forward to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan slams Merritt back against the rocks, trying to kn the grin off his alien face. No luck.  Merritt moves to his feet and laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOWLAN SLAMS THE DOOR on his locker, anger still bubbling inside of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shouldn't let him rattle your cage like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By Thursday night, this will all be over.  Merritt'll be breaking red rocks on Mars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My luck, I'll be reassigned there as a guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you could date Stilson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They leave the locker room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester walk around a circular hallway towards crew quarters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw you two looking at each other. If it weren't for anti-fraternization rules, you'd have asked her to be your naked rhumba partner long ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't try to shit me, Nowlan.  Have you seen what she looks like under that uniform?  I'd kill or die for a chance at that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Bester.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say I end up on the Mars Colony and Stilson gets transferred to Earth. (beat) How do we rhumba when she's thirty nine million miles away?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan opens the crew quarters door for Bester.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could FAX her kisses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's satisfying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan lets the door slam closed behind them.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The prison building bakes under the twin suns.

dialogues.speaker: A TITLE IS SUPERED
dialogues.text: We see the shuttle zoom out of the sky and begin its slow descent to the Prison's shuttle dock.  The shuttle lands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan reads from a video-clipboard, reporting to Gernsbe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of the electronic weapons and the majority of the human and alien prisoners have been transferred off the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's left?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skeleton crew.  Stilson, Giesy, Kline, Carter, Bester and myself.  All of the Max Security prisoners, including Merritt...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shackle them into the shuttle as soon as possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's going to take ten hours for it to refuel.  That's a lot of time chained to a chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it.  I want all of the Max Securities locked into the shuttle brig as soon as possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, with all due respect....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just do it, Nowlan.  If Merritt or Pratt complains, I'll jettison them into deep space.  I'm in charge, here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. (beat) I have Giesy and Kline packing up all of the reserve weapons and ammunition. I think we can last the next ten hours with personal sidearms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan's clipboard beeps and he looks down at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle just docked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GIESY, a guard who's a Born Again Christian, puts the lid a create of rifles and begins nailing it closed. Kline and Stilson help crate up all of the guns and equip Carter sits at the security section, watching monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the operating system?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have to leave it behind. Need the computers for shuttle take off and atmosphere manufacturing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those animals are going to tear it apart.  Use it to rewire themselves.  They'll be nothing left for a salvage company to loot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then they'll go to hell.  Ask Giesy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy looks up from hammering, frowns threateningly at Kl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, they're Droids.  Droids don't go to hell, they aren't human.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy growls, realizing that Kline is making fun of him.  Before he can quote scripture, J.W. CAMPBELL saunters in. Campbell is the pilot of the shuttle, a good looking flyb in the overly fancy uniform of the U.S. Space Force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: J.W. Campbell.  I'll be your pilot on this escape from hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell holds out his hand to shake, and Kline takes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kline.  I'm a Marshal, here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're the Marshal, who's the Sheriff?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bad joke, which rates only a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That'd probably be Al Bester.  Thinks he's a cowboy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been accused of that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Giesy, and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's the pretty lady?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell shows Stilson all of his teeth.  She isn't impre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Janet Stilson.  Marshal Stilson to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Marshal, I'm stuck here for the next ten hours while my fuel cells re- energize.  Kind of hoped to spend the time in bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure you could use the sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not what I had in mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you aren't landing here, sky pilot.  Runway's closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's obvious that Campbell isn't used to being rejected. He takes a step back... Bumping into someone. When he turns around, his smile returns. Garby returns the smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: J.W. Campbell, the shuttle pilot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.  I've got ten hours to kill.  Thought I'd spend it in bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you?  That sounds interesting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could be. (beat) Tell me: What's a beautiful girl like you doing on a prison planet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They didn't tell you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell looks from Stilson to Kline to Giesy. All three give him cryptic smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm doing twenty five years to life for sexually mutilating more than a hundred men... I bite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell takes a step back, color draining from his face. Garby waves goodbye, and enters her father's office. Campbell watches her leave, still in shock. Kline touches his arm and explains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warden's daughter.  Strictly off limits around here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell nods slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A room filled with cots, used by the Androids for resting But all are empty. A GROUP OF ANDROIDS ring Ralph 124C41, who stands on a ta All of the Androids are nodding at everything Ralph says. Becoming angry and agitated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These humans are SCRAP and should be treated like SCRAP!  The time has come for the Androids to seize power. Kill every human and alien on the planet.  And have the Warden's head on a plate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Androids CHEER LOUDER AND LOUDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kline drives an electric scooter with a trailer (empty) o double doors marked "SHUTTLE BAY" and heads down Hallway HALLWAY #6 is a long, industrial-looking hallway with a b red stripe broken only by the number six. Kline whistles a tune as he scoots down the long hallway. Occasionally, he steers right into the wall, only to corr course at the last minute.  Anything for a thrill. AT THE END OF THE HALL he turns into ANOTHER long hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HALLWAY #7 has a GREEN stripe broken only by the number s Kline scoots down this hallway, still whistling, occasion driving like a lunatic, until he comes to a door at the e marked "COMMAND CENTER". The scooter and trailer come to a stop.  Kline gets out a knocks on the door, smiling at the overhead security came

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STILSON'S VOICE squeaks from speaker next to the electron door controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use your Mag-Key.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't.  Lost it last week.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least you didn't give it to a prisoner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's an electronic noise, and the doors are opened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kline drives the scooter into the Command Center, pulls u next to a stack of crates and shuts off the motor. Stilson shakes her head at Kline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're such a screw up, Kline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least I'm the best at what I do.  I used to be the best screw-up Marine, now I'm the best screw-up Prison Guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson rolls her eyes and points to the last twenty crat of weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.  Let's get them loaded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns to Giesy, who's on his knees praying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy, put God on hold and give us a hand, here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy ignores her, finishing his prayers before helping t Giesy, Stilson and Kline load the crates onto the trailer but can't fit the last crate on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not gonna fit.  I'll come back for it, later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we can tie it on top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skip it.  I'll take nineteen crates this load and one the next. (beat) Big deal.  It's not like the shuttle's going anywhere for the next nine hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're wasting a trip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kline hops into the scooter and starts it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Stilson.  I'm wasting time in a professional manner.  There's a difference.  My way, I get promoted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls a U turn and scoots out the doors, while Stilson rolls her eyes.  She turns to Giesy, who is already on hi knees preparing to pray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to miss him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy ignores her and begins to pray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KLINE zig-zags through the hallway, trying to see how clo to the walls he can get without scraping them. He begins singing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, she's just a sheep, but she's the love of my life.  And someday, I'll have my way, and take her for my wife. (beat) Bahhaaa, bahahhaha, bahhaaa, bahahhaha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets to the corner, and turns onto Hallway #6, not kno what waits for him....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. Hallway #6 is empty. Kline continues to zig-zag, almost skimming the walls, si to himself and laughing when he almost hits the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh when I see her in the fields, my heart with love is full. And when I get her in my bed, I stroke and kiss her wool. (beat) Bahhaaa, Bahahhaha, bahhaaa, bahahhaha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bored out of his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan enters, handcuffed to Merritt. Behind them, Bester is cuffed to Pratt. ANOTHER PAIR OF GUARDS escorts a dozen leg-shackled PRISO into the command center. Stilson exchange a smile with Nowlan, then back to busine

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you going to do with them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trade us to the Yankees for a third round draft choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan yanks on Merritt's chain to shut him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck wants them secured in the shuttle immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We aren't leaving for another nine hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck's idea of discipline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to hear my idea of discipline?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It involves the Warden's daughter in skin tight leather and a ping pong paddle... The kind with sandpaper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I really don't want to hear it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan turns to Giesy and Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy.  Carter.  Take these two down to the shuttle and lock them in the brig.  Stilson, take over for Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson nods and sits in Carter's chair when he vacates i PRATT is shackled to Carter, and MERRITT is shackled to G

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, reverend. Looks like it's you and me.  The saint and the sinner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up, Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARTER, MERRITT, PRATT, and GIESY lead the procession of PRISONERS and GUARDS to the doors to Hallway #7. Stilson watches the video monitor.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE MONITOR
dialogues.text: The end of Hallway #6, where Kline is ramming the scooter against the wall repeatedly.  The trailer is empty. BAM!  He hits the wall, bounces backwards a few feet, the BAM!  Rams it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ought to see Kline.  He's playing bumper cars in Hallway Six.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's WHAT?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just goofing off, as usual.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell him if he doesn't get back here to get this crate he'll be goofing off on suspension with out pay for two weeks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson clicks on a microphone and speaks into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You hear that Kline?  Nowlan's going to suspend you without pay for two weeks if you don't quit goofing off.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE MONITOR
dialogues.text: Kline continues ramming into the wall with his cart. He doesn't seem to care about being suspended. Giesy uses his mag-card to open the doors, and the proces leaves the Command Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy, Merritt, Pratt, and Carter and the others walk dow Hallway #7.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn the corner, and walk down Hallway #6 towards Kl who continues to ram his scooter into the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're in a heap of trouble, there, boy. Nowlan's gonna fry your ass when you get back to the command center.  You'll probably end up like me... Chained to a Saint on the way to hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy yanks on Merritt's chains to shut him up.  When the get to the end of the hall, CARTER walks up to Kline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kline.  Will you stop jacking off? (closer) Nowlan's serious.  He's going to put you on suspension if you don't quit ramming that scooter. (closer) You probably dented it. (closer) Don't let Gernsbeck see it, he'll take it out of your pay. (closer) Kline?  Are you listening to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter grabs Kline's shoulder to turn him around, and Kli falls over... DEAD! Neck torn open, blood soaking the front of his uniform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God!

dialogues.speaker: BANG
dialogues.text: Gunfire begins spraying over the men, bullets ricocheting ALL HELL BREAKS LOOSE!  Gunfire blasting everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson watches the video monitor, which shows one CELL B after another.  All are EMPTY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of the cell blocks are empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.  We transferred out the prisoners yesterday...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even the Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan turns away from his paperwork, color draining from his face in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit...

dialogues.speaker: BANG
dialogues.text: Bullets begin flying through the command center, shatteri glass and exploding computer monitors.

dialogues.speaker: ALL HELL BREAKS LOOSE
dialogues.text: Gunfire blasting everywhere. The crew hits the dirt, bullets ricochet overhead, explod a planter right above Bester and showering him with dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PRISONERS AND GUARDS are pummelled with gunfire. Bullets spark off the walls. Merritt and Giesy duck behind the Scooter. Giesy's eyes closed in silent prayer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COBLENTZ HL2000 yells above the gunfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're all SCRAP! Kill the humans!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ANDROIDS aims their stolen guns at the Prisoners and Guards and open fire. A PAIR OF PRISONERS get killed, slamming back against the wall and leaving a smear of blood. Merritt ducks as bullets spray overhead. Then he notices Kline's corpse on the bouncing scooter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guard's gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He times the bouncing scooter for a moment, then uses it' movement as cover when he pops up and tries to grab the g from Kline's holster. BULLETS SPATTER around Merritt as he realizes Kline was a leftie... the holster's on the wrong side!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt ducks back down, just as a new volley of gunfire sparks off the Scooter.  He didn't get the gun. PRISONERS lay wounded and screaming on the floor, chained together and trapped.  Gunfire blasts around them, occasionally cutting off one of their screams. Pratt and Carter are trapped in the center of the hallway bullets fly all around them.  Face down, next to each oth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter nods an affirmative.  Bullets spray around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On three.  One.  Two. Three!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter and Pratt pop to their feet. Running to Hallway #7.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: A bullet sparks off their handcuffs.  Severing them. Pratt takes a quick look at the cuffs, realizing he's fre keeps on running.  At the corner of Hallway 6, he turns t yell at Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter, come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But instead sees Carter get shot a half dozen times.  Kil Pratt runs around the corner to safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck hides under his desk as bullets ricochet throug his office.  He's scarred, shaking.  A trickle of urine r down the leg of his pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BULLETS fly over Nowlan's head. He looks to Bester, covered with dirt, notices the last c of guns just behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester!  That crate of guns!  We're gonna need them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester turns to see the crate.  Crawls across the floor, bullets spatter around him.  When he reaches the crate, h realizes he can't pry it open with his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a hammer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson has the hammer near her, and slides it across the floor into Bester's hand. Bester grabs the hammer and goes to work opening the crat A bullet explodes a corner of the crate into a shower of sawdust, and Bester ducks.  Using the crate as cover. Stilson ducks as the monitor above her is destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson closes her eyes as debris rains around her. Nowlan scoots to the wall and raises his pistol overhead, firing out the window blindly. Stilson grabs a shard of mirrored glass and scoots along floor to Nowlan's side.  Holds the mirrored glass overhea using it as a periscope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many of them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hundreds.  An army.  They have rifles and shotguns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester gets the crate open and begins pulling out weapons

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So do we. Catch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester throws a shotgun to Nowlan, and a rifle to Stilson Nowlan and Stilson catch guns, swing to their feet and fi a volley out the window, then dive for cover. RETURN FIRE pummels the room, exploding anything on the counter and sending papers scattering. NOWLAN waits for a lull, pops to his feet and pulls the trigger on his shotgun. Click!  Out of shells!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BARRAGE OF GUNFIRE from the Androids has Giesy and Merr pinned behind the scooter.  No way Merritt is going to re Kline's gun.  Giesy keeps praying silently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Padre.  God's not gonna get us out of this one.  We're on our own.  Gonna have to make a break for it.  Understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy continues his silent prayer, ignoring Merritt.  Mer yanks on the handcuff chain, getting Giesy's attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Understand?  We gotta RUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy nods slowly, anger in his eyes. Merritt and Giesy wait for a lull, then make a break for Running down Hallway #6, chained together by their handcu BULLETS chase them down the hallway. Androids advance, lead by Coblentz HL2000, firing rifles. HALFWAY DOWN THE HALL, one of the wounded PRISONERs reach out and grabs Merritt's leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off me!  Get off me!  Let go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt kicks the PRISONER until he lets go, then they continue running down the hallway, bullets chasing them. THE ANDROIDS ADVANCE. Coblentz SHOOTING the wounded PRISONERS along the way, to stop their screaming. Merritt and Giesy get to the corner of the hallways... THE ANDROIDS are chasing right behind them!  Firing the e time. Bullets spraying around Merritt and Giesy.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: Giesy shot in the chest, almost yanking Merritt off his f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giesy falls down dead... still hand cuffed to Merritt! The Androids continue to advance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt makes it around the corner into Hallway #7, dragg Giesy's body behind him. Momentarily out of the line of f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Geeze, Padre, you weight a ton!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE DOOR TO THE COMMAND CENTER (and safety) at the far en of the hallway. Merritt drags the body behind him, in a race for the door

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz HL2000 kills the last of the fallen Prisoners an turns to the Army of Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill the scrap!  Get him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Androids round the corner into Hallway #7.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt and dead Giesy are hallway down the hall when the Androids open fire at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn you, come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drags Giesy's corpse at high speed to the Command Cent BULLETS SPRAY around Merritt as he POUNDS on the command center doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me in!  Let me in!

dialogues.speaker: BUT THE DOORS DON'T OPEN.
dialogues.text: The Androids continue to advance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!  Come on!  You can't just leave me out here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pounds some more. The doors don't open. The Androids are getting CLOSER and CLOSER! Merritt is trapped.  Then he remembers something. THE ANDROIDS advance, guns ready to blast Merritt to piec Merritt scoops the gun from Giesy's holster, opens fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eat lead tinman!

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: He hits five Androids, dropping them to the floor, before shifts aim to Coblentz HL2000 and pulls the trigger. Click!  Out of shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz HL2000 laughs, and raises his rifle at Merritt. Merritt pounds on the door some more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open up.  Please.  Please.  Open the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz HL2000 takes aim and fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester opens the Command Center door quickly, and Merritt drags Giesy's corpse inside. Bullets follow, and everyone has to hit the dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz HL2000 and his platoon of Androids rush the open door.  Trying to get in the Command Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester sees the Androids coming in, and tries to shut the door...  A few Android arms reach between the door and th jamb, grabbing for Bester's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Need a hand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt jumps to his feet and helps Bester squeeze the do shut.  One of the Android's arms gets stuck... and is sev Bester gets the door shut and locked.  The gunfire sudden stops.  Silence is deafening. Stilson uses her shard of mirror to look out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt picks up the crawling Android hand, offers it to Bester.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You needed a hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester knocks it out of Merritt's hands. It crawls away. RALPH'S VOICE BOOMS from the loudspeaker overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scrap humans.  I control your destiny.  I will let you LIVE in exchange for Warden Gernsbeck. Your lives for his!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The voice turns to static. Bester looks at Nowlan, then at Gernsbeck's office. J.W. CAMPBELL comes out of the day room, alive, but scare

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt rises from behind the counter, Merritt smiles at hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glad to see I'm not the only prisoner to make it out of this.  How about getting me out of these cuffs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods at Giesy's corpse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's starting to get on my nerves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck comes out of his office cautiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cuffs stay on.  He's still a Prisoner, and we'll treat him like one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, Verne, there's three hundred of them and only eight of us.  Seems like you could use all the help you can get.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't need the help of scum like you, Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan steps up to Merritt and pulls out his hand cuff ke

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's right.  We need all the help we can get.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan unlocks Merritt's handcuffs. Merritt rubs his wrists, smiling at Gernsbeck. Then he notices Garby, as she rises up from cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, sugarpie.  I'm a free man.  Want to help me celebrate?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want me to put the cuffs back on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  I want HER to do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt winks at Garby, who smiles. Nowlan doesn't smile. He grabs Merritt by the collar and yanks him off his feet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You better start remembering you're still a prisoner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We all are, aren't we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're trapped here.  No way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's the shuttle.  It'll take another eight hours to fuel, but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until then, we're all prisoners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But only one of us has an attitude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw off, Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: Nowlan punches him.  Merritt returns a punch, and they exchange blows, slamming each other with their fists, unt Stilson breaks it up.  Standing between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.  Hey.  We've got to work together, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Convict.  Some day, you and me is gonna fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be looking forward to that day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Merritt try to fight again, but Stilson is bet them.  She pushes both of them back, concentrating on Now Nowlan calms down, and looks at the crew: Stilson, Campbe Garby, Pratt, Bester, Gernsbeck, and finally Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to be ready for them when they come back. (beat) Stilson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your eye on the monitors.  They're out there someplace.  If they come this way, yell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson covers the monitors, watching the two undamaged screens.  Trying not to blink, least she miss something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Al. I want you to booby trap the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right, chief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester starts to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warden, could you look over the floor plans?  Try to find us some escape routes in case of emergency?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who elected you leader?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one.  You want to put it to a vote?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck looks from face to face, ending on Merritt's sm

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just keep that man away from my daughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't help it if she likes Smovs. We do it in stereo, you know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You dirty little son of a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan's turn to break up a fight.  He blocks Gernsbeck's crazed rush at Merritt, holding the Warden back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more word out of you, Merritt, and you're back in shackles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt rolls his eyes, but steps back. Gernsbeck gives Merritt a scowl, moves to the map in the center of the Command Center and starts punching control buttons for details.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks at the rest of the team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody else gets to help fortify this place.  Block the windows the best you can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE REST OF THE GROUP goes to work.  They push file cabin in front of windows.  Break up a desk and nail the parts over the windows, and turn the place into a fortress. Nowlan inventories guns and ammo from the single crate. Counting bullets.  Loading weapons.  Getting ready for ba STILSON keeps watching the monitors.  Trying not to blink Her eyes are beginning to burn from keeping them open so long.  She blinks a few times to clear them. WHEN SHE BLINKS, we see a SHADOW flit across one of the monitors.  When her eyes are back open, the shadow is gon

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: We see the Prison building under Isaac's twin suns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE COMMAND CENTER becomes the Human/Alien version of The Alamo: A Fortress in the middle of hostile territory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Human SCRAP!  Your flesh is no match for our steel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan moves up behind Stilson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's he coming from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson clicks through dozens of security shots, trying t find where Ralph 124C41 is broadcasting from.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will kill you all.  Tear you limb from limb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got to be somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson continues flipping through security images.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spill your precious bodily fluids upon the floor.  Unless you hand over Warden Gernsbeck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FINALLY Stilson flips to an image of Ralph 124C41 circled Androids, looking directly into the security camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cell Block 11.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep him talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan grabs a rifle and a shotgun and starts to the door

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a sec, I'll go with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester grabs a shotgun, and the two exit. Stilson grabs the microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you want the Warden?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To make restitution for the wrongs he has committed against me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What wrongs are those?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surely you must know.  The sadistic pleasure he gets from punishing us. The way he forces us to live in terror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been convicted of a crime. Sentenced to punishment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Violence is a crime in your world, but violent punishment is not.  The Warden has killed, and deserves punishment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck seems unrepentant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester and Nowlan creep down the hallway, guns ready. The come up to a doorway leading to Cell Block 11, and the Bu Room a few open doors away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph continues to speak into the video monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester turns to Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you get him from here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan aims his rifle carefully, trying to get Ralph's he (three rooms away) in his cross hairs. He squeezes the trigger twice. Bang!  Bang! Both shots MISS Ralph 124C41!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph turns his head slowly, in the direction of the shoo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right at Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester take off running. Behind them, Ralph yells orders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill the human scrap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HALF DOZEN armed Androids lead by Ralph 124C41 burst ou of the doors and give chase. Nowlan and Bester turns and fire a volley at the Androids dropping a few... But they keep on coming! Nowlan and Bester run like hell, Androids chasing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester enter Hallway #9, with the Androids onl hundred feet behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great idea you had.  Glad I came along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would have had him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.  If he were two inches taller.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill Ralph and it's over. T hese others won't fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan shrugs, dives into a doorframe, and aims his gun a the corner of the hallway.  Bester takes cover behind him WHEN THE ANDROIDS round the corner of the hall, Nowlan an Bester open fire. A half dozen Androids go down, none of them Ralph. The Androids keep charging.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester dive out of the doorframe and keep runn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Course, if you get them angry enough, they'll fight even after you kill Ralph.... If you ever kill Ralph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mister positive thinking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your positive thinking almost got us killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your lousy running's gonna get us killed.  Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Bester pour on the speed, turning a corner int another Hallway.  Androids right behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HALFWAY DOWN THE HALL, Nowlan and Bester spot SMITH EE17 a platoon of Androids entering in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith EE17 spots them, raises his gun, and fires. Nowlan and Bester return fire.  When they run for cover i doorway, Bester gets tagged in the leg by a bullet. Nowlan rolls into the cover of the doorway, and spots Bes trapped in the center of the floor... As Smith EE17 and his troops advance from one end of the hall and Ralph 124C41 and a half dozen Androids advance f the other end. Nowlan pumps his shotgun and rolls out to rescue Bester. Blam! Blam! Blam! He gets off three shots, before getting caught in the crossfire from the two groups of Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of here!  Run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bullet tags Nowlan in the arm, and the shotgun goes fly out of his hands.  No time to save Bester. Nowlan rolls back to the door, uses his mag card to zip i open, and escapes into a storage room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan can't just run away.  That's his best friend out t He hugs the wall under a window, listening.  Frightened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Cowboy, just you and me, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bester SCREAMS in agony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many people in the Command Center?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hundred.  More.  Extra guards.  All waiting to kill your aluminum ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan sees Ralph's reflection in a chrome panel as he lo his shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong.  There's less than ten.

dialogues.speaker: BLAAAM
dialogues.text: Blood spatters over Ralph's face. Nowlan takes off.  Scurrying across the floor to the door the far side of the Storage Room.

dialogues.speaker: BAM
dialogues.text: Someone is POUNDING on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who goes there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan. Open the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell disengages the booby traps, opens the door, Nowl slides in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Bester?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group looks at each other.  Fear in their eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUDDENLY, one of the mechanical humms turns into a grindi sound, then stops completely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got bigger problems.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've cut off the oxygen generators for the entire complex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Androids don't need air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the rest of us do.  How much time do we have on the remaining air?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About six hours, if we take it easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much time until the shuttle's refueled?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eight hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will there be enough fuel in six hours to get us to our own Solar System?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but not enough to land.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll send a distress.  They can have a rescue ship waiting near Pluto.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six hours of air.  We can make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't hold your breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan frowns at Merritt, then sets the timer on his watc to count down from 6:00... Counting the minutes of air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Prison frying in the sunlight. Time and air running out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt is flirting with Garby again, as Gernsbeck watche

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've never done it with a Smov?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only humans. (beat) Is it true?  What they say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When a human has it, they call it Diphallic Terata.  But for Smovs, it's considered normal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never met a human with... Diphallic Terata.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're out there.  Gotta be, or else they wouldn't have a name for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never come across one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two.  You'd come across two.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.  And all Smovs are....?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  My gun is twins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Side by side?  Or over and under?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over and under.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fascinating....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does it make you uncomfortable?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  I think I can accommodate you. Have you named them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.  The one on top is Jose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the one underneath?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Hose B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby smiles, and takes Merritt's arm. Gernsbeck has had more than he can take, and attacks Merr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your hands off my daughter.  Fucking perverted convict.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt and Gernsbeck fight, exchanging punches. The others watch them fight it out. Merritt is in better condition, and grabs Gernsbeck's fis before it can make contact, tossing the Warden over his shoulder and onto the floor. Merritt moves over Gernsbeck, who covers his face from th impending stomp... Which never happens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afraid I'm gonna stomp you? (beat) That's the difference between you and me, Verne.  You hurt people because you like it.  I only hurt people in self defense. (beat) If it were up to me, I'd let those tin men have you.  Let you pay for what you've done to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt turns and walks away. Gernsbeck gets to his feet and attacks Merritt from behin Blind-siding him.  Nowlan pulls him off, trying to contai the Warden's attacks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warden.  Let it go.  Just calm down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saw what he did to me. We should kill him.  Put a gun to his head and blow his deviant brains to hell...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you don't calm down, we're going to have to restrain you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck's anger bubbles over, he gets right in Nowlan's face.  Yelling at him, shoving him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Restrain me?  I'm the warden, asshole. I'm in control here, not you.  You're just a fucking guard.  You can't even keep your partner alive, why do you think you can...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan takes all the pushing he can from Gernsbeck, decks him.  Gernsbeck, knocked out, drops to the floor. Nowlan turns to Campbell and Garby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take him to his office and handcuff him to the chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They take him away.  Stilson notices blood on Nowlan's ar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got tagged.  Nothing serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me fix it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson takes him into Gernsbeck's private wash room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson cleans and dressed Nowlan's wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You going to be okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a flesh wound.  Of course, it's MY flesh.  OUCH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry.  I mean, about Bester.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He... He was a good man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wasn't afraid to tell me the truth, even when he knew I wouldn't like it. (beat) Will you tell me the truth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods slowly.  Their faces only an inch away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think we can make it out of this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.  But I DO know, this might be our only chance....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves her face towards him, but Nowlan moves back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fraternization is against the rules.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the desert outside the Prison Building, a group of And under Smith EE17 search for a back entrance to the Comman Center.  They find a steel door labeled "AIRLOCK #4", ope it, and enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group ignores Stilson and Nowlan when they exit the w room, tension between them. Merritt gestures to Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look.  I was thinking.  There's a couple dozen emergency rebreathers in the air locks.  They might come in handy if we get down to the wire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks around the room for someone to send with Mer Stilson?  No.  Too dangerous for her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell?  You and Merritt check out the air locks.  Bring back all the rebreathers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't trust me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never have.  Never will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt accepts this, nodding slowly. Merritt turns to Campbell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm coming along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt tries to dissuade her, but she stops him before h can speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need all the guns you can get out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE THREE, armed and ready for action, use Garby's mag-ca to exit through the door marked "AIRLOCKS".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The trio creeps through the hall, lights flicker around t Suspense builds.  They come to a corner. Merritt gestures for Garby and Campbell to hold back as h scouts ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt peeks around the corner into Hallway #13. The hall is empty all the way to the Airlocks at the end. Lights flicker, and several doorways are dark... Maybe with Androids hiding inside them. Merritt creeps down the hall. Tension builds as he passes each dark doorway. But nothing happens. When he gets to the end of the hall, and the Airlock door he gestures for Garby and Campbell to join him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby and Campbell creep down the hall, guns ready.  Each time they pass one of the dark doorways, tension builds. At the Airlock door, the trio gives the hallway behind th a final sweep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks are deceiving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get the rebreathers and get the hell out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods, and gestures for Campbell to open the door while he and Garby cover. Campbell slowly opens the Airlock door. Nothing inside but darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's make this quick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell nods and enters the Air locks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell gets one step inside the dark airlocks before he the noise.  A METALLIC ECHO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who goes there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The answer is gunfire.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: Campbell is BLASTED out of the airlocks and skids between Garby and Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby and Merritt start running. The Airlock is filled with a dozen Androids, lead by Smit EE17.  The Androids begin spilling out into Hallway #13.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell looks down at his wounded leg, gushing blood, an tries to stagger to his feet. BULLETS fly around Garby and Merritt as they race towards the end of the hallway. Merritt turns and sees Campbell trying to crawl away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He provides cover fire, blasting away at some of the Andr Sending some slamming backwards in a shower of sparks. Campbell crawls along the floor, leaving a trail of blood Garby stops running and joins in the cover fire. But Merritt realizes they don't have a chance. He turns to her between blasts and yells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of here.  Run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just run, I'll hold them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They exchange a look, then Garby reluctantly complies... After blasting one last Android into scrap. As soon as Garby is gone, Merritt tries to save Campbell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell.  Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith EE17 gets Merritt in his sights, smiles, and fires. Merritt hits the dirt, rolling across the hall and poppin to his feet. The bullet ricochets down the hall behind hi Merritt fires cover shots, trying to force the Androids b so that Campbell escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!  Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell crawls towards Merritt. Closer. Closer. Almost there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMITH EE17 aims at Merritt again and fires.  The other Androids chime in, forcing Merritt to dive around the cor to Hallway #12.  Bullets chunk the corner of the hall, se plaster dust into the air. Campbell keeps crawling, but Smith EE17 grabs him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell struggles to get away, but can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby runs down the hallway to the Command Center door. Passing dark doorways along the way. WHAM!  A shower of sparks shoots out a doorway as Garby p it, as a light fixtures short circuits. Garby keeps running to the end of the hallway, and the sa of the Command Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt tries to force Smith EE17 away from Campbell, but forced back around the corner by gunfire. Campbell is dragged back by Smith EE17.  He tries to figh him off, but can't.  But he CAN reach the Android's gun h Campbell and Smith EE17 struggle for the gun, wrestling b and forth.  Campbell gets the barrel twisted around so th it aims at Smith's face and tries to find the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damned hunk of tin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith EE17 twist the gun around to aim at Campbell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Human scrap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell sees the gun aiming right at his face, and press the barrel up only moments before it discharges.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: A hole is blasted into the ceiling. Smith EE17 yanks the gun away from Campbell, then clubs h over the head with it.  Knocking him out. Then Smith EE17 turns to the other Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gesturing to Merritt) Kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Androids advance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby pounds on the Command Center door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me in!  Let me in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one answers.  She can hear the gunfire getting closer. She pounds on the door some more, then remembers her mag- card key.  Fumbles, trying to find it, swipes it through lock.  The Command Center door opens, she squeezes inside

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right into Hell. The Command Center is under siege again.  Under attack by army of Androids lead by Ralph 124C41. When Garby squeezes through the door, Nowlan spins, aimin his gun at her... Ready to fire. When Nowlan sees who it is, he yells:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut the door and get down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Nowlan goes back to BLASTING Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt begins blasting the advancing androids into a sho of sparks.  But they keep on coming. THE SEVEN REMAINING ANDROIDS move past their fallen comra advancing on Merritt. Merritt aims at the first one and pulls the trigger.  BLA The First Android is blown backwards in a shower of spark Merritt aims at the Second Android and pulls the trigger. Click.  His gun is out of shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Second Android laughs.... Until Merritt throws the gun at him, scoring a direct hit his face.  The Second Android goes down, and Merritt take off running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt runs down the hallway, chased by the six Androids He gets to the Command Center door, and realizes he has n mag-key.  He begins POUNDING on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me in!  Let me in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The six androids are almost on top of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unlock the damned door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt continues pounding, as the androids get closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's hard to hear Merritt's pounding over the din of gunf in the room.  Garby, Nowlan, Stilson and Pratt blast away the army of androids outside the windows. Garby fires out a window, but hears the pounding. Without turning from the gun battle, she unlocks the door with her foot. Merritt squeezes into the room... but so do a dozen andro arms!  Merritt tries to push the door closed, but the And are stronger.  Merritt looks around for help, but everyon is busy blasting the androids outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Android hands claw at him, as he tries to press the door closed.  But there's no way he can hold them back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Throw me a gun!  Throw me a fucking gun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan tosses Merritt his 44 Magnum.  Merritt catches the gun with one hand, then jumps back from the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALL SIX ANDROIDS rush into the room. MERRITT quick fires: six shells, six androids, six head s ALL SIX ANDROIDS go down in a shower of sparks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me take out this garbage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Pratt, Nowlan and Stilson hold the fort, Garby help Merritt push the six android bodies out of the Command Ce dodging ricochets the entire time. Once the bodies are out, they close and lock the door, an Merritt takes cover next to Nowlan as he reloads. Nowlan fires and talks simultaneously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Campbell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They got him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan stops firing and looks at Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's alive, Nowlan.  But he's theirs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the only pilot we've got.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone looks at Merritt, letting this bad news sink in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gestures out window) Don't get them pissed, who knows what they'll do to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan gives Merritt a look, then goes back to blasting Androids.  Every time Nowlan sees an Android head, he fir at it.  It's like an arcade game... "Doom", maybe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's next?  Step right up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blam!  Nowlan fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a winner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE GUN BATTLE CONTINUES with Pratt, Nowlan, Stilson, Gar and Merritt blasting away.  Bullets fly through the Comma Center, shattering computer screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glass rains down on Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes cover and reloads as bullets spatter around him. Garby sights through the boarded windows and blows a coup of Androids to hell. Pratt spots Coblentz HL2000 in the hallway, takes aim, an fires. The bullet misses, but Coblentz gets mad.  Rising up, he sends a stream of gunfire at Pratt. Pratt hits the dirt as boards covering the window splinte Bullets ricochet through the room, shattering glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great.  Now he's angry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was hoping he'd be dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby and Pratt pop up at the same time, blasting at Cobl and his Androids, forcing them back down the hallway. Merritt has reloaded, and blasts a half dozen Androids, forcing the others back. Nowlan fires two guns through the barricades, forcing And to take cover and retreat. SUDDENLY, the shooting from outside stops. The silence is deafening. Nowlan rises up slowly, looking out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've fallen back to regroup.  They'll attack again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson, check the monitors.  Tell me where they are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Janet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan moves across the Command Center to her... finding dead.  Shot in the crossfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Janet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He cradles her in his arms, fighting back the tears. The others just watch him, unsure what to do. Nowlan holds her face up to his and kisses her gently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet dreams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then sets her body down, closes her glassy eyes, then loo up at Garby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the only time I ever kissed her.  I always wanted to.  We used to flirt back and forth.  Joke about her serving under me.  I used to think about holding her. Touching her face... But fraternization is against the rules. (frowns) I always have to play by the rules. Do what's right... even when it's wrong.  Even when it's too late. (beat) It's always too late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan is about to totally break down. Merritt crosses the room and pulls him to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan, this thing isn't over yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over.  First Bester, now Janet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got to pull yourself together. At least until we're out of here. (beat) We can't do this thing without you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks at Merritt, confused by his compassion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I can handle it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods slowly, and lets go of Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt zips Stilson up in a body bag.  Then looks at the others.  Pratt looks at the bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we should say some words or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) Too bad they shot the Preacher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby moves down next to the body bag.  Pratt bows his he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
