dialogues.text: Janet, you were a good friend in a world where friends are hard to find.  And Good is even harder. (beat) You'd walk among the prisoners, and never show fear.  I don't know how you did that. (beat) Where ever you are now, walk without fear.  And know that we'll miss you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A moment of silence. Then Merritt looks at Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly) Come on.  Give me a hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt picks up one end of the body bag, and Nowlan lift the other.  Difficult at first, but Nowlan manages to con his emotions, and just do the work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck looks up as the door opens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You going to let me out?  So I can punish that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees Nowlan's expression and stops. They carry the bod bag into the room and set it down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stilson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't leave her here!  I won't stand for it.  I refuse to be in the same room with her!  She's dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt crosses and grabs Gernsbeck's collar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, asshole, we're all going to be dead in three and a half hours.  We're running out of oxygen, and they just captured our pilot. (beat) Things are pretty well fucked, here, Verne. The last thing we need is a lot of screaming from some sadistic pile of shit like you. (beat) So take my advice: Shut the fuck up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt lets go of Gernsbeck, dropping him back into his chair.  He turns to Nowlan, who is staring down at the bo bag, on the verge of cracking again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.  We've got work to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan turns from the body bag.  He and Merritt leave Gernsbeck's office...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And walk into Hell. Pratt is holding the Command Center hostage, and the mome Nowlan and Merritt enter, he swings his gun on them. Merritt casually raises his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shouldn't you be aiming that thing outside?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm getting out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods to the door, and the Androids beyond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you get it, man? We're all gonna die. First it was the Joker, then the Preacher, then Cowboy, now the Girl. (beat) I mean, it's getting down to the nubs, here. (beat) Next it'll be the Marshal and Daddy's Girl... And after that it's either you or me. (beat) I'm not hanging around long enough to find out which.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you plan on going?  Seems to me we're trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt swings the gun towards Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't we just get on the shuttle and get out of here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We wouldn't get far before we ran out of fuel. (beat) Then we'd be adrift in the galaxy without any life support systems.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least nobody'd be shooting at us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, why give up a quick death when we could die slowly of asphyxiation?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt reaims his gun at Merritt. Behind him, Garby slowly creeps forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't need any shit from you, Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want, Pratt?  The good news?  There isn't any.  We're stuck on this piece of shit planet for the next three hours while that ship fuels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat) Now we can argue about it, and we can fight about it, but we can't change it.  So quit pointing the damned gun at me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt keeps the gun aimed at Merritt. Garby takes another step closer, ready for action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't we wait in the shuttle, then?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at how much damage they've done to this room. (beat) The shuttle couldn't take this much damage and survive.  We'd never get off the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby takes another step... And Pratt swings around, aimi his gun at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, Pratt, we're the bait.  As long as they're attacking us, they're leaving the shuttle alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man, I can't take any more of this fighting...  I'd rather end up drifting through the galaxy in the shuttle then be some sitting duck for those droids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least here we have a chance, Pratt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt aims at Nowlan, and Garby attacks. She grabs the gun barrel, twisting it up at the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: The gun discharges, showering them with debris. Pratt pulls the gun back down.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: The gunshots force Merritt and Nowlan to hit the dirt. She struggles, pressing the gun back up at the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt pushes the gun around until it is aimed directly at Garby.  His finger tightens on he trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last words, Bitch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby looks down the gun barrel, realizing she's about to die.  Pratt's finger continues squeezing the trigger.    Garby lets go and ducks out of the way quickly.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: Bullet goes wild, hitting the vidmap with a shower of spa Merritt jumps to his feet and tackles Pratt to the floor. They crash into a work station, sending it down. When they stop rolling, Merritt is on top of Pratt. But P still holds the gun.  He aims it directly at Merritt's fa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off me, Smov, or I'll blow you to hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt touches the gun barrel to Merritt's face and pulls trigger. Click.  Out of shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got to learn how to count.  At least as high as six.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt slams the gun out of Pratt's hands and pins him t the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, Pratt, we're all in this together.  Flesh against steel.  If we start breaking up, fighting each other, they'll kill us one by one. (beat) The only strength we have is working together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna throw in with that screw?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What choice do I have?  What choice do ANY OF US have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt points at Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I may hate him.  I may wish him dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan gives Garby a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the four of us are stuck here together.  And we're not getting out of here any time soon. (beat) So I've got to learn to work with him.  And work with you. (beat) I may not like it, but I don't see me having much choice in the matter.  Do you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lets go of Pratt and moves to his feet.  Pratt just la there.  Finally Merritt reaches a hand down to help him u Pratt looks at Merritt's hand and reluctantly accepts. Merritt pulls Pratt to his feet, then the two separate. P goes off to sulk, Merritt examines a cut from the scuffle Nowlan crosses to the Vidmap.  It's completely destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No more early warning system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) There goes our advantage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt goes into the wash room next to Gernsbeck's offic to wash and dress his wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt is wrapping the cut as Garby enters, letting the door close behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was a nice speech, but did it mean anything? (beat) Or were you just making music to sooth the savage beast?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meant every word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Especially the part about wishing Nowlan were dead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I might have exaggerated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves closer to him, serious, now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you really think we're going to get out of this alive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.  But I have to keep coming up with plans and possibilities, or we're as good as dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then this might be my only chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To do what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To find out if what they say about Smovs is true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves into his arms and kisses him gently on the lips

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck sees the silhouettes come together through the pebbled glass of the connecting door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When Merritt kisses back, Garby pulls away a little. After flirting with Merritt for years, here they are abou to make love... and she's not sure she'd ready for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never done it with an alien before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all alien to somebody. (beat) We look different, we smell different, we act different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But even if we found someone who looked just like us, they wouldn't be us. They'd be their own person.  Have their own thoughts, their own needs. (beat) You can spend your whole life thinking about how different you are than other people.  Me?  I'd rather think about the ways we're the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt kisses her gently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smovs kiss the same as humans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kiss again, more passionately.  She runs her hand un his shirt, feeling his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We feel the same as humans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another kiss.  They begin removing each others clothing, gently kissing each new exposure of flesh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We love the same as humans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their passion flares as they kiss again, bare chest again bare chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck struggles against the handcuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) No. No. No. No. No. No. No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Practically frothing at the mouth as the silhouettes of h daughter and the alien move close again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan watches the remaining monitors for signs of the Androids.  Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're out there someplace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt re-barricaders the windows.  Using the rest of the furniture to block any holes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt moves his hand under her skirt, pulling her panti down her legs.  Garby kicks them off, then guides his han back under her skirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kiss again.  Then they glide to the floor and make l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck fights harder against the restraints as he hear intimate laughter from the next room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) No.  He's a filthy alien.  A damned prisoner.   Garby... Garby...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His voice becomes softer, resigned to the fact that his daughter is no longer under his control.  Maybe never was Gernsbeck looks over to the body bag on the floor across from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) Garby....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shadows flutter over the pebbled glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt finishes barricading the windows. Nowlan watches the screens for signs of action.  But they show only empty hallways.  A sound behind him. Nowlan spins to see Merritt exiting the washroom, tucking his clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much time until the shuttle's refueled?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little over two hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And until we run out of air?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods, and joins Pratt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna need a couple minutes head start to get to the shuttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can we rig one of the doors to close?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. But where do we get the power? All this equipment's hard wired in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batteries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt points at Nowlan's equipment belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's one in your walkie talkie. Enough juice in there to slow 'em down for a minute or two.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan unclips the walkie talkie and tosses it to Merritt who begins to hot wire a door circuit on the control boar Nowlan looks back at the monitor...

dialogues.speaker: ON THE MONITOR
dialogues.text: RALPH 124C41 holds a gun to Campbell's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention human scrap.  Let's make a deal.  Flesh for flesh.  This worthless piece of scrap for the Warden. (beat) Give us Gernsbeck, and we'll let you go.  We have no rift with you, it's the Warden who has hurt us.  And it is HE who will pay. (beat) So?  Do we trade?  This one for the Warden?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt looks at Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say we hand over the son of a bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought we were all in this together? Flesh against steel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Warden's different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They wouldn't be out there if it weren't for that sadistic son of a bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan aims his gun towards Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say we take a vote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I vote we trade him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trade him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm against it, and so's Gernsbeck...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's two for, two against.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes are on Garby. The deciding vote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pleading) You can't make me do this.  He's my father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got to decide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, he's an asshole.  He's always been an asshole.  He can't help it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is it?  For or against?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby looks at her father's office, making the toughest decision of her life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't get out of here without a pilot.  We can wait the two hours until the shuttle's fueled, but if no one can drive it, we're stuck... Trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns away from the others, breaking down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.  God, I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt raises his gun at Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You heard the woman.  We trade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt switches on the microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, tinman. We trade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph 124C41 laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph 124C41 laughs when he sees Gernsbeck. THE EXCHANGE is like something from a Cold War spy novel. On one end of the hallway: the ARMY OF ANDROIDS lead by R 124C41, who holds his gun to Campbell's head. On the other end of the hallway: Pratt, Nowlan and Garby guns at the Androids, while Merritt tries to control the screaming, pleading Warden Gernsbeck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't do this to me.  They'll kill me.  Don't you understand?  They'll KILL me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you don't shut up I'll kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please Merritt....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt ignores him, looking at the far end of the hallwa where Ralph holds the gun to Campbell's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.  We trade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not you.  The guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guard brings me the Warden. Unarmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt and Nowlan exchange looks.  Then Nowlan hands Mer his rifle and takes hold of Gernsbeck's shackles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph and Campbell begin advancing to the center of the h at the same speed as Nowlan and Gernsbeck. THE FOUR face off in the center of the hall, about a doze feet between them.  Ralph keeps the gun jambed into Campb head.  Nowlan has a six shooter, hidden behind his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This one must be pretty important, if you'll trade the warden for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tension.  They can't let Ralph know how important Campbel is.  They can't let him know he's the pilot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's just a tech.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never seen him before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sent him on the shuttle to look over the computer systems for salvage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Computer tech?  Maybe we should keep him.  Use him for repairs after you have gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He salvages, he doesn't repair.  He's just a junk man...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A junk man? You know what he told me? He told me he was the shuttle pilot. (beat) Now why would he lie like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look.  Just let him go.  I'll give you the Warden.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph 124C41 laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No deal.  We'll TAKE the Warden.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: Ralph blows Campbell away, then reaims his gun at Gernsbe Gernsbeck starts screaming.  Begging. Nowlan kicks the gun out of Ralph's hands, then quick dra his pistol, blasting away until the Androids dive for cov Merritt, Pratt, and Garby give cover fire for Nowlan and Gernsbeck. Blasting away at the Army of Androids. Gernsbeck drags his shackles back to the group. Ralph rolls, coming up with his gun.  He aims it at Nowla and the two exchange gunfire, like Cowboys at high noon. Bang! Bang! Bang! Bang! It's a close quarters shootout, like something from a Joh Woo movie. Nowlan yells at the others as he fires at Ralph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back!  Back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group races back down the hall to the Command Center. Nowlan takes one final look at Campbell (he's dead), then fires a couple more shots at Ralph and joins the others i their mad dash to the Command Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullets spatter the hallways as the five run. RALPH AND THE ARMY charge after them. Gernsbeck is lagging behind, dragging his heavy shackles. He trips on the chains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me!  Oh, God, help me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan helps Gernsbeck to his feet, and they try to catch with the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PRATT, GARBY, and MERRITT turn the corner into the next hallway, and sprint to the Command Center doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! They're right behind us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby slides her mag key through the slot and nothing hap She tries it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.  It's demagnetized...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Gernsbeck round the corner, racing towards the THE ARMY OF ANDROIDS only fifty feet behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan! Your card!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan tosses Garby his mag key, then spins and fires at oncoming Androids. Garby catches the key, glides it through the slot, gets t green light.  The door opens. Nowlan aims at a charging Android and pulls the trigger. Click. Out of shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan DIVES and rolls down the hallway, popping to his f next to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The five dive into the Command Center, closing the door b them only SECONDS before the Androids get there. BAM! BAM! BAM! BAM! Ralph pounds on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you going to get off the planet without a pilot, Nowlan?  You're trapped here.  My prisoners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Garby look at each other.  Worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In less than two hours you'll run out of air....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two hours, twelve minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks at Merritt, and he explains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Campbell's air, divided by five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm practical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph continues his tirade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...After you're dead, I'll TAKE the Warden. Put his head on a plate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck begins crying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then WE will fly the shuttle back to Earth.  And kill every human we can find. No one will be able to stop us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt puts his ear to the door, listening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're falling back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks from face to face. Everyone has that hopeles expression.  Their pilot is dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's right.  Without Campbell, we're trapped.  He was our only chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not our only chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt looks up slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can fly us out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're full of shit, convict.  Where'd you get your pilot license?  San Quentin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt moves fully to his feet, standing tall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used to make a good living hijacking cargo shuttles.  I can fly just about anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope we live long enough to find out if you're right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They can kill a lot of us in two hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not if we kill them first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you propose to do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We use the Merritt System.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they attack us with guns, we attack them with cannons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) Great idea.  Where do we get the cannons?

dialogues.speaker: THE BROKEN VIDMAP
dialogues.text: Merritt's finger touches a location, as he speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are a couple of crates of explosives in mine shaft number seven. We had to leave them behind when the Deros came after us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt nods, remembering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we can get those explosives out of shaft number seven, we can rig a bobby trap that'll blow them into small appliance heaven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great.  How do we get to shaft number seven?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the air ducts.  When we get outside, we can use the last rebreather tank.  There's about five minutes on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It could work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt shakes his head.  Desperation has turned to anger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a frigging suicide mission you're talking about.  Get past the Droids, get out of the complex, get to shaft number seven, which we closed because it was too dangerous, hope the damned Deros aren't hungry, find the crates of explosives and sneak them back here, right past the Droids...  All with only five minutes of air?  You're crazy.  You're all crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got a better idea?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt turns away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give them the Warden.  It's what they want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That kills him, but it doesn't save us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.  This is frigging shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, Pratt, we've got a choice.  Hide here for two hours, waiting to die, or stand and fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt turns to Merritt and nods slowly.  Accepting. It's obvious that Merritt has taken charge of the group. He's become the leader by default.  The man with the plan Gernsbeck raises his shackled hands towards Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're not going to use me as a bargaining tool, can you at least unshackle me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  The cuffs stay on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt, there's three hundred of them and only five of us.  Seems like you can use all the help you can get.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't need help from sadistic mothers like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt, we need all the help we can get and then some.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods slowly, then looks Gernsbeck in the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut him loose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan unshackles Gernsbeck, tossing the cuffs aside. Gernsbeck smiles at Merritt and offers his hand to shake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No hard feelings?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When Merritt moves to grudgingly take it, Gernsbeck pulls back his fist and decks him. WHAM!  Merritt hits the floor, hard. Gernsbeck flexes his aching hand. Pratt makes a move towards Gernsbeck, but Merritt stops h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I had that coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt moves to his feet, rubbing his jaw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that we're all even, it's time to choose.  Which one of us is going out there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who decides?  You?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt pulls out a huge knife and STABS it into the tabl between he and Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The knife decides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The knife quivers in the table.  Nowlan nods.

dialogues.speaker: THE TABLE
dialogues.text: All five stand around the table, forming a circle.  The k lays in the center of the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes on the knife as Garby gives it a spin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did this when I was a kid.  Spin the bottle they called it.  Only the winner got a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No winners here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE KNIFE continues spinning. Everyone watches as it begins to slow down, blade pointin from one to the other as it rotates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to look....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She closes her eyes. THE KNIFE stops spinning.  The blade has found a victim. The knife blade is pointing at PRATT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This must be your lucky day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  But it's all bad luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A rope is tied around Pratt, and the rebreather (with an readout which will count down the 4:53 minutes of air lef is strapped on his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt nods.  Gernsbeck claps a hand to his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wish you wouldn't have said that.  People been wishing me good luck all my life, look where it got me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got four minutes and fifty three seconds of air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use it wisely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This gets a smile out of Pratt, who checks the action on gun and gets ready to go. Garby gives him a kiss on the cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt grabs her and plants a major-rotor-rooter french ki on her, dipping her a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There.  Now I feel I lucky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt looks at Nowlan and Merritt, who get their guns rea Then Garby opens the Command Center door, and they roll o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Merritt aim their guns down the empty hallway, Garby helps Pratt pry off the air vent grate and climb in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt begins crawling through the duct, rope playing out behind him. Gun in front of him, ready for action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby keeps feeding the rope from the coils into the vent opening, while Nowlan and Merritt stand guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The air in the duck is becoming smokey.  Pratt puts on th rebreather, and the LCD numbers begin counting down. AHEAD: Light at the end of the duct. Pratt climbs towards the light, then kicks out the mesh s separating the duct from the outside world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby keeps feeding the rope. An echo in the hallway.  A sound.  A footstep? Merritt and Nowlan keep their guns aimed, ready for actio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under the burning twin suns, Pratt treks across the red d landscape to the mines.  The rope playing out behind him. The time on his rebreather ticking away. The LCD now reads 4:27 minutes of air left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck watches Pratt progress on the only undamaged monitor, and yells to the others, in the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He made it out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt and Nowlan keep their guns trained.  Garby keeps uncoiling rope.  A sound in the hallway echoes.... Tension builds.  Merritt keeps his gun ready. Nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt makes it to the mines. The heat has him breathing deeply. 3:39 minutes left on the rebreather. Pratt enters the cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck yells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's entered the cave!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck's voice echoes in the hallway.  Merritt whisper

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quiet.  Quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the echo dies down, there's another noise.  Footstep Getting closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone's coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt and Nowlan keep their guns ready. Garby continues playing out the rope. Tension builds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt uses a flashlight to search the mines, until he com to a make-shift sign identifying Shaft #7. 3:07 remaining on the rebreather. He moves deeper into Shaft #7, looking for the crates of explosives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt and Nowlan keep their weapons aimed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in the mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The voice echoes, obscuring the footfalls.  Merritt and N keep their guns aimed.  Waiting for the attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt's flashlight picks up the two crates of explosives. He pockets the flashlight and grabs one of the crates. 2:28 remaining on the rebreather.  He's going to have to hold his breath on the way back. WHAM! The Deros strikes! The hideous, smelly, creature bursts from the cave, teeth and tentacles reaching for Pratt. Pratt runs like hell, carrying one of the crates, the Der right behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another footfall.  Someone is standing just around the co from where Nowlan and Merritt are. Garby, unarmed, continues playing out the rope. Another footfall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more step and we'll blow you to hell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks at Merritt, wondering about his strategy. Then they hear the laughter. The laughter of machines. Hundreds of them. Echoing through the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt escapes from the cave only seconds before the Deros would have caught him. When the bright sunlight hits the Deros, it screams and d back in the cave. Pratt sets the crate down, then lays over it, trying to c his breath. 1:47 remaining on the rebreather. Then Pratt sees the shoes.  He looks up to see Smith EE17 aiming a gun down at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you think you're going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt knocks Smith EE17 back and makes a break for it. He doesn't get far before Smith steps on Pratt's rope. Pratt is trapped, tethered only a dozen feet from Smith.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so fast.

dialogues.speaker: BANG
dialogues.text: Smith blows off Pratt's kneecaps. Smith strolls over to where Pratt lays screaming and pull off the rebreather, tossing it as far away as he can. With a laugh, Smith EE17 ambles back to the compound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith EE17 approaches Ralph 124C41.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One down, four to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph nods approval, then turns to his troops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember, I get the Warden. (beat) Here's my new plan of attack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph explains his strategy to the Army of Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt holds his breath and drags himself to the crate, un his rope, and hooks it to the crate.  He gives it two tug

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby feels the tugs and whispers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reel it in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby begins reeling in the rope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pratt smiles as the crate of explosives is dragged back t the compound. Then he closes his eyes and dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby continues reeling in the rope. But there's laughing in the hallway. The echoes of a dozen Androids. Lead by Coblentz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry up. Hurry up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby tugs as fast as she can, but the rope has stopped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crate is caught behind a big rock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby gives the rope another tug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's stuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt lowers his gun and goes to help Garby. THE FOOTFALLS continue echoing. Closer. Closer. Closer. Merritt and Garby give the rope a yank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crate pops over the rock and continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt lets Garby reel in the rope, and crosses to his g

dialogues.speaker: BANG
dialogues.text: Coblentz rolls into the hallway and opens fire.  Bullets ricochet around Merritt as he tries to make it to his gun Nowlan returns fire, trying to force Coblentz back.  But Coblentz is joined by a half dozen other armed Androids. Garby continues reeling in the rope, as bullets fly aroun her.  Shredding the wall only inches from her face. Merritt makes it to his gun, rolls it into his hands and begins blasting away.  Hitting a couple of the Androids. Nowlan hits a couple of androids, but they are out number

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crate gets caught on the outside of the air duct. It's tugged a couple of times.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby keeps tugging, but the rope won't budge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's stuck again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're on your own, Garby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullets spatter around her as she tries whipping the rope then yanking on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rope flips loose, then finally is pulled into the air duct, dragging the crate behind it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby continues reeling in the rope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm running out of shells!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shoot out between Coblentz's troops and Merritt and N continues.  But for every Android they kill, another take it's place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crate of explosives drags along the inside of the air coming closer to Hallway #13.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby continues gets to the end of the rope, and pulls th crate of explosives into the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt tosses Garby his gun.  She catches it with one ha turns, and blows away an advancing android. Merritt races to the crate, hefts it to his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three race into the Command Center, slamming the door behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan locks the door seconds before the Androids reach i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz and the androids begin scratching at the door wi their aluminum fingernails.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scratching fingernails creates a sound which drives t up the walls.  Gernsbeck puts his hands over his ears and closes his eyes. Merritt, Nowlan, and Garby live with it. Merritt begins rigging a detonator to the case of explosi and secures the explosives to a rolling file cart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When this button's pushed, everything goes.  Blam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking for volunteers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We do it from across the room.  With a bullet.  I think I can hit it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan nods without conviction.  The detonator button is VERY small target. The scratching stops, and Gernsbeck opens his eyes, looki at the monitor.  His face shows terror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan looks to Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many shells do you have left?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan checks his rifle, then breaks open his pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three rifle, two pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby checks her pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt checks his shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's only thirteen rounds for a couple hundred Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much time left until the shuttle's fueled?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fifteen minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to hold them off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt looks at Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Save one bullet to shoot the detonator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby grabs the metal rods from the uniform closet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can use these as spears.  When our ammo runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods... Then the first bullets begin spattering through the barricaded windows. EVERYONE hits the dirt, weapons ready. Merritt lands next to Nowlan on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, buddy, you know that fight you and me was gonna have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is it.... Except, I always thought we'd be fighting each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan smiles, and touches Merritt's shoulder. They're equals, maybe even friends. Garby tosses a spear to her father... Then the real shooting begins. BULLETS PUMMEL THE COMMAND CENTER, blasting the window barricades to pieces.  Wood dust and smoke spatter around the team as they take cover. Merritt crawls to the hot wired door switch. With fifteen minutes left, it's too early to hit it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He clicks the walkie talkie switch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RALPH 124C41 leads a second wave of ANDROIDS towards the Command Center... but the electronic door wooshes shut in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open it! Open it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Androids tries to over ride the door at the co panel... but has no mag card.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt aims his shotgun through the barricades, sights a charging Android and fires. BLAM!  The Droid explodes in a shower of sparks. GarbY aims through the barricades at an advancing Android and fires. Bang!  The Android sparks and drops.  But more are coming Nowlan sights in on one of the Droids and fires.  The And drops.  He re-aims quickly and fires again.  Two hits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck jabs through the barricades with his metal spea poking through an Android's eye and out the back of his h The Droid goes down, sparking and screaming. Merritt sees two Androids coming from the left and blasts both of them with one shot. Garby fires at the three Androids rushing her, hitting tw of them.  Her third shot misses... and the Android contin down the hall towards her. Nowlan sights a third Android and fires.  Bang! Nowlan's bullet hits one Android, sparking his face, and ricochets to hit a second Droid in the chest.  Both go do

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.  A two-fer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE THIRD ANDROID continues rushing at Garby.  Now only f feet away from her.  She aims her pistol at him and fires Click.  Out of shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Android reaches through the broken window and grabs G by the neck, strangling her. Gernsbeck spears another Android through the eye. Merritt sights another rushing Android and blows him to h Garby tries pulling away from the Android, only succeeds dragging the droid through the window into the Command Ce The Android continues strangler her.  She's turning blue. She tries to scream for help, but only gurgles.  She can' be heard over the gunfire from the Army of Androids. Nowlan sees Garby struggling with the Android, spins and aims at the Android, pulling the trigger three times. Click.  Click.  Click.  Out of shells. He clubs the Android with the rifle, careful not to hit G The Android lets go of Garby and faces Nowlan. THROUGH THE HOLE IN THE BARRICADES, other Androids try to enter the Command Center.  But Gernsbeck spears each one them through the eye socket, nose, or mouth.  Shorting th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another Android starts through the barricades, and Gernsb reaches for a spear.... all out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt turns in time to see the Android grab hold of Gernsbeck.  He takes aim and BLASTS the droid off Gernsbe Gernsbeck runs to the door leading to the Shuttle Bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to leave.  Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We all go at once!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan tries clubbing his Android with his rifle.  But th Android grabs the gun and yanks it out of Nowlan's hands. THE ANDROID laughs, raising the rifle to club Nowlan. Merritt sees Nowlan predicament, spins, and fires his sho Click.  Out of shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls back the shotgun, throwing it like a spear. The shotgun barrel hits the Android in the head... pierci his face and popping out the other side.  Sparks fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any time.

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: An Android bursts through the barricades and attacks Merr Merritt is defenseless, struggling. Nowlan pulls out his pistol, trying to aim at the Android But Merritt keeps getting in the way of a clear shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of the way.  Damn!  Damn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No chance of Nowlan hitting the Android from this distanc without endangering Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ANDROID is squeezing Merritt, ribs about to snap. Merritt can't breath.  His eyes flutter.  He's going to d He tries pulling the Android off, doesn't have the streng Then Nowlan gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt!  Catch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan throws his gun.  Merritt catches it with a free ha aims it over his shoulder at the Android's face, and fire

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: The Android's head comes off, and he falls away from Merr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt gets ready to toss the gun back to Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it.  One bullet left.  For the detonator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt nods and pockets the gun. THEN THE BARRICADES BLAST open and five androids storm th Command Center: Coblentz HL2000, Smith EE17, and three NA looking Biker Androids. SMITH goes after Garby. COBLENTZ goes after Nowlan. The three BIKERS go after Merritt. Gernsbeck goes out the door, leaving it open. Garby rolls across the floor, coming up with the fire axe She faces Smith EE17 with the axe, ready for battle. Nowlan pulls a hanger pole from the closet, holding it li a bo as he faces off with Coblentz HL2000, ready for batt Merritt grabs the knife from the counter, spinning around keep the three Biker Droids away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck huddles in the hallway near the Command Center door, afraid to go down the hallways to the Shuttle Bay a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith EE17 gives Garby an aluminum smile seconds before striking out at her with one of his pincher-claws. Garby jumps away, the claw snaps on a pipe, severing it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That could have been your neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This could be your face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She swings the fire axe at Smith's face, but he blocks it with his arm, deflecting the blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure you don't want to be my main squeeze?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith reaches out for her with his claw, snapping it clos only inches from her face.  Garby is on the defensive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan swings his hanger pole bo at Coblentz, who ducks a rolls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're SCRAP. All humans are SCRAP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan swings again, just missing Coblentz's head. Coblentz rolls again, this time popping to his feet by th pipe Smith has severed. Nowlan uses the pole as a spear, charging Coblentz. Coblentz tears the pipe off the wall and uses it as a bo, deflecting Nowlan's spear. Coblentz and Nowlan engage in a bo fight.  Blocking, swin thrusting their weapons at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt is surrounded by the three BIKER DROIDS.  He spri swinging the knife around and keeping the Bikers at bay. The LEAD BIKER laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you fight us, alien?  Look at yourself.  We're just like you. Prisoners of the humans....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three close in again, and Merritt spins, slashing the knife across all three Droid chests.  Sparking off each o of them as the blade screams over steel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's two sides to everything.  I've chosen mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're one of us.  An outsider.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two differences: I'm flesh, you're steel.  You kill because you like it. I kill only in self-defense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three: You bleed, we don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAM!  The three attack simultaneously.  Three against on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby bumps against the wall. Nowhere to run. She has to fight. She swings the fire axe out at Smith. Smith pulls back, the axe whizzes past. Missing. He laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's make this quick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you like.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith grabs the axe in his pincher and tries to yank it o of Garby's hands.  She holds on, as Smith twists.  Spinni her off her feet onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting this one out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Garby's still got the axe in her hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz swings his pipe at Nowlan's head.

dialogues.speaker: WHACK
dialogues.text: Nowlan blocks it just in time. Coblentz laughs and swings again.  WOOSH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silicon works faster than brain matter.  I know where you're going to swing even before you do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan fakes left, swings right.  And Coblentz blocks it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan fakes left, but SWINGS left.  Coblentz blocks it. Coblentz laughs and flips the pipe into his hands like a spear.  Then charges at Nowlan. Nowlan is trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt has all three Biker Droids attacking from differe sides, and swings into action. Kicking backwards, he hits BIKER #2 in the chest, swingin forward, he hits BIKER #3 in the face, spinning, he hits LEAD BIKER in the neck. All in one move. All three go down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My lucky day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three roll to their feet and attack again! Merritt spins with his knife, sparking off all three Droi chest, and forcing them back. For a second. Then they ATTACK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith EE17 looks down at Garby and smiles aluminum teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so fast, sugar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby tries to squirm away without giving up her grip on fire axe.  Impossible. Smith moves his face in close, then his SECOND set of alu teeth shoot out at her on their metal teether. The teeth come within inches of Garby's face and SNAP clo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby twists the axe handle in her hands, popping it out Smith's grip. She pivots the axe so that it swings... Cutting off Smith's spare teeth at the tether.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith screams and falls back. The metal teeth scurry along the floor like a snake. Garby SLAMS the axe head down on them, smashing them to sparking pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Play time is over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith attacks. Pinchers ready to do real damage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz rushes Nowlan with his pipe/spear. Nowlan is trapped in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No escape, screw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan twirls the pole in his hands, hitting the counter top, POLE VAULTING over the counter out of harm's way. Coblentz spear jambs into the wall where Nowlan was stand only seconds ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your silicon chips missed that one, huh?  Did they see this one coming?

dialogues.speaker: WHAM
dialogues.text: Nowlan spins the pole, cracking it into Coblentz's head w enough force to send him over the counter. Now Coblentz is weaponless. The pipe still stuck in the wall. Nowlan jabs Coblentz back. Coblentz spins and strikes out at his face with a steel h Nowlan uses the bo to block.

dialogues.speaker: CRACK
dialogues.text: Coblentz cuts the pole in half with a powerful blow. Now Nowlan has two short sticks... And Coblentz ATTACKS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph 124C41 and the second wave of Androids (three times many as the first wave) finally crack open the door and r down the hall to the Command Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt has three Bikers attacking simultaneously. When he pulls his fist back to hit Biker #2, his elbow ja Biker #3 in the throat.  After punching Biker #2, he uses his left hand to punch the Lead Biker. All three move back for about a second, and then attack a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you guys ever give up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biker #3 charges him.  Merritt jumps up, landing a two fo kick into the Biker's chest. BIKER #3 slams back, head crashing into a monitor.  Explo of sparks as the Biker Droid short circuits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biker #2 tries to jump him, but Merritt twists his fist, using the knife to sever the power cord on the Droid's ne The knife's follow through almost cuts off Biker #2's hea BIKER #2 hits the floor in two pieces: Head and body. Merritt turns to the Lead Biker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready for yours?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More than ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt and the Biker circle each other like caged beasts Biker #2's severed head waits until Merritt gets close be it bites him on the leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt screams, then PUNTs the head out the window and returns his attention to the Lead Biker. Too late.  The Lead Biker charges at him. Merritt feels (Coblentz's) metal pole at his back.  Trapp When the Lead Biker gets close, Merritt just steps aside. Allowing the Biker to skewer himself on the pole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hope you got my point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smith EE17 attacks Garby, pinchers ready. Garby swings her axe at Smith's head. Smith ducks, and the blade whizzes overhead. Garby swings her axe at Smith's legs. Smith jumps, and the blade whizzes under foot. Garby swings her axe at Smith's stomach...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, just right.

dialogues.speaker: WHACK
dialogues.text: The blade connects big time, cutting Smith in half. Both halves hit the floor: Dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coblentz HL2000 attacks Nowlan.  Nowlan uses the two halv of the pole as escrima sticks, pummeling the Android. Coblentz knocks Nowlan to the floor.  The two wrestle acr the floor, Coblentz the stronger of the two. Nowlan has the Droid's stitched body pressing him to the floor and gets an idea.  He snatches up a piece of broken glass, and cuts one of the stitchings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see what happens if I pull a few strings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He yanks open the seam, exposing Coblentz's metal insides Coblentz picks up a chunk of fallen metal and gets ready brain Nowlan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan uses the broken glass to cut wires and hoses in Coblentz's chest, sparking and shorting and causing a gus of lubricating fluid to spew out. Coblentz falls over, twitching... then dies. Nowlan moves to his feet and looks from Merritt to Garby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get to the shuttle.  I'll hold the rest of them off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do be a fool.  Get moving.  Take the explosives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Garby nod, and push the rolling cart of explos out the open door.

dialogues.speaker: CRASH
dialogues.text: Behind Merritt, a dozen Androids lead by Ralph 124C41 bre through the barricades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember, he's mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt is completely outnumbered... and weaponless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck hears people coming through the Command Center door and tries to hide.... But it's Garby and Nowlan, pushing the cart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God. I've been waiting for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three run down Hallway #7, pushing the cart of explos in front of them. AT THE CORNER TO HALLWAY #6 there is a moment of suspense They don't know if Androids lay in wait around the corner Nowlan rolls out, ready for action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. The hallway is empty all the way to the shuttle bay doors Garby and Gernsbeck swing around the corner with the cart explosives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll wait here.  Maybe he'll need some help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're crazy.  Fuck Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck takes off down the hall to the shuttle bay door

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) Merritt's one of the few people I can trust.

dialogues.speaker: AT THE SHUTTLE BAY DOORS
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck realizes he doesn't have a mag card on him. He can't get into the shuttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt faces off against Ralph, the other Androids ringi the room around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready to die, Alien?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm ready to finish what I started. Turn you into scrap.

dialogues.speaker: WHACK
dialogues.text: Merritt kicks Ralph in the face. Ralph laughs it off, pressing Merritt back towards the wa Ralph moves in to attack. Merritt scoops up a chair, using it as a shield. Like a lion tamer keeping an angry cat at bay. Ralph tries punching around the chair, but can't reach Merritt's face.  He kicks up, forcing Merritt to jump bac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one can fight an Android and win. Flesh can't win against steel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that right, tin man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt SLAMS the chair into Ralph, crashing him backward Ralph hits the counter and GROWLS, charging at Merritt. Merritt holds up the chair, but Ralph bats it out of his hands and keeps on coming. Ralph and Merritt trade punches. Merritt takes the brunt. He can't hold off this Android himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're no man of steel, Alien.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph hits Merritt it the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Die slow or die fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt feels the gun in his pocket.  He could blow Ralph pieces... But he needs it for the detonator. Ralph swings a fist, and Merritt rolls away, popping up n the door to Hallway #7. Ralph laughs, and starts towards him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No escape, Smov. We fight to the death. Your death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt spots his fallen knife leaning up against a split piece of wood.  He steps on the end, flipping it into the air and catching it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come and get me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph takes the challenge, charging at Merritt. Merritt rolls backwards through the door....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt pops to his feet, stabbing Ralph as he comes out door.  But the knife hits his chest and SPARKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE OTHER ANDROIDS come out the door, forming a ring behi Ralph 124C41. Merritt swings the knife at Ralph's face, but he ducks.   The knife severs the plastic casing over a power cord, se half the hallway into darkness. The power cord sparks and sputters on the floor like a sn Ralph waits for Merritt to swing the knife again, then kn it from the Alien's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now we have a fair fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph moves in and begins pummeling Merritt with his fist Merritt tries blocking the blows, but flesh really is no match for steel.  Ralph is going to beat Merritt to death

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby and Nowlan listen to the fight. Garby moves to help Merritt, but Nowlan holds her back.  It's Merritt's fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph slams a fist so hard into Merritt's face, it knocks him a dozen feet backwards. Merritt hits the floor HARD. He touches the gun again, wondering if he should use it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No fucking way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph laughs and charges him, ready to put an end to it. Merritt looks up at Ralph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph is almost on top of Merritt when he grabs the spark electrical wire and forces it into Ralph's eye socket. Ralph screams, sparking, and catches fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knew you'd get a charge out of that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt moves to his feet as Ralph falls over, sparking, twitching, dead.

dialogues.speaker: THAT'S WHEN THE REST OF THE ANDROIDS ATTACK
dialogues.text: They charge at Merritt.  Two dozen metal killers. Merritt RUNS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby hears someone running around the corner, and gets r to attack.  But it's Merritt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!  Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He keeps on running.  Nowlan and Garby fall in beside him THE POUNDING OF HUNDREDS OF ANDROID feet echoes, as the A Of Androids ROAR down Hallway #7 to Hallway #6. Merritt, Nowlan, and Garby run like hell. Then Garby trips and goes down. Hard. THE ANDROIDS round the corner from Hallway #7. Merritt sees that Garby isn't with them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees her on the floor, trying to get to her feet. THE ANDROIDS race towards them. Merritt goes back for her. Grabbing her hand and pulling her to her feet. Then he rolls the explosives cart into the charging Andro knocking the three in the lead down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He and Garby run like hell down the hallway, until they c to the shuttle bay doors.

dialogues.speaker: AT THE SHUTTLE BAY DOORS
dialogues.text: Nowlan uses his mag card to open the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt pulls out his gun and takes careful aim down the barrel at the detonator button. THE ANDROIDS are on their feet, trying to get around the explosives cart.  More and more of them pouring into the hallway by the minute. HUNDREDS OF ANDROIDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt squeezes the trigger. Firing the last bullet. Bang! Misses the detonator, but takes off an Android's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We won't have time for lift off if we can't keep them away from the shuttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE ANDROIDS begin moving towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take care of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before anyone can stop him, Gernsbeck begins charging the army of Androids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy!  No!  No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan and Merritt drag Garby through the shuttle bay doo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowlan locks the shuttle door behind them as Merritt star pressing buttons on the control panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hope I remember how to drive one of these things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hits a switch, and the rockets engines begin to ROAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck is grabbed by a pair of androids before he can make it to the detonator.  He uses all of his strength to DRAG them back with him. When Gernsbeck gets to the cart of explosives, an Android grabs him from behind, choking him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you die, Warden.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gernsbeck presses the detonator button.

dialogues.speaker: BLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAM
dialogues.text: The Androids and everything else in the hallway is blown fiery bits.  Flames race the hallways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle takes off from the docking bay, zooming away from the surface of Isaac and it's twin suns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle zooms away from Planet Isaac.

dialogues.speaker: BLAAAAAAAAM
dialogues.text: A massive explosion rips through the planet, turning the surface into a fireball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merritt, Garby, and Nowlan look out the shuttle window at the fireball which was once the planet Isaac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think we used too much dynamite?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three are safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuel cells will take us all the way to Saturn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Going home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garby smiles, and touches Merritt's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle zooms off into deep space and we....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "ANDROID ARMY" c 2000 by William C. Martell
